title: Bug 11866Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: Bug 11866Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
OB: "Test Classes to be included" is written with TestClasses (missing space)The status line talks about methods being selected instead of types.The action name is written together (TestSuite) instead of Test Suite
EB: "Test Classes to be included" is written with TestClasses (missing space)The status line talks about methods being selected instead of types.The action name is written together (TestSuite) instead of Test Suite
SR: "Test Classes to be included" is written with TestClasses (missing space)The status line talks about methods being selected instead of types.The action name is written together (TestSuite) instead of Test Suite
